basics.name: Sanzhar Umbet
basics.label: Data Scientist & AI Researcher
basics.summary: Data Scientist and AI researcher with experience in NLP, speech processing, and applied ML, contributing to open-source projects and academic research across Kazakhstan, Canada, and Germany.

work.name: Bereke Bank
work.summary: Working on ML pipelines and real-time analytics for a major Kazakh bank.
highlights: Engineered features for AutoML, boosting service personalization by 15%
Developed anonymization library using NER models (F1 ↑ 20%)
Benchmarked Whisper and M4T for speech tasks
Built clustering-based text labeling system
Optimized LLM inference via contextual caching (API costs ↓ 20%)
Developed real-time Insight Service for customer analytics

work.name: Horde Research
work.summary: Leading contributor to Kazakh AI open-source initiative.
highlights: Built synthetic datasets for LLM benchmarking
Released the largest Kazakh SFT dataset
Benchmarked LLMs for performance evaluation
Fine-tuned dialogue models for better context

work.name: Nazarbayev University – National Laboratory of Astana
work.summary: Worked on ASR and NLP models for Kazakh language.
highlights: Developed Wav2Vec2 XLSR-based language ID model (F1 = 92.9%)
Built inverse normalization model (+25% punctuation accuracy)
Improved training robustness via data augmentation

work.name: Brock University – NLP Lab
work.summary: Contributed to model confidence and hallucination research.
highlights: Analyzed logit vs. external confidence in open-source models
Investigated hallucinations and model reliability
Co-authored ACL 2024 main conference paper

work.name: Nazarbayev University – Astrophysics Research Group
work.summary: Studied magnetic fields using computational astrophysics.
highlights: Visualized fields using Stokes parameters and astropy
Improved hub filament detection (+15%)
Used Spectral-Cube for 3D visualizations (false positives ↓ ~80%)

work.name: Nazarbayev University – Robotics Department
work.summary: Worked on RL-based control for motors in autonomous systems.
highlights: Improved PMSM control with RL techniques
Translated Simulink models to Python

publications.name: Restoring Punctuation and Capitalization in Kazakh: A BERT-Based Approach for Text Normalization
publications.summary: Presents a BERT-based inverse normalization model for restoring punctuation and capitalization in ASR transcripts.

publications.name: KazBench-KK: A Cultural-Knowledge Benchmark for Kazakh
publications.summary: Introduces a benchmark to evaluate cultural and linguistic understanding in Kazakh LLMs.

publications.name: Wav2Vec2 XLSR-Based Spoken Language Identification for Kazakh
publications.summary: A multilingual language ID model trained and optimized for Kazakh speech using Wav2Vec2 XLSR.
